transcript:
officers as he went: "Have these gentlemen attended to and taken to my bivouac; let my doctor, Lar- rey, examine their wounds. Au revoir, Prince Repnfnl" and he spurred his horse and gal- loped away. 
His face shone with self-satisfaction and pleasure. 
The soldiers who had carried Prince An- drew had noticed and taken the little gold icon Princess Mary had hung round her brother's neck, but seeing the favor the Emperor showed the prisoners, they now hastened to return the holy image. 
Prince A
